```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head_data = df.head()  
    describe_data = df.describe() 
    return [head_data, describe_data]  

result = preview_data(data)

print(result[0])  
print(result[1])
```
